text: cng klaw theid muhammad “chan khx teuxn phwk than pheiyng khx deiyw wa phwk than cng yun khun pheux xallxhˌ (khrang la) sxng khn læa khn deiyw læw cng tirtrxng du (k ca pracaksʹ wa) shay khxng phwk than nan midi penba tæ khea pen pheiyng phu takteuxn phwk than thung kar phechiyhna kab kar lngthosʹ xyang sahas theanan”
